subject: URGENT: FINAL NOTICE before Public Escalation - Unpaid Balance $75.80
description_text:
Dear Simsonn Affiliate Team,

I am writing this as a final notice regarding my overdue payment of $75.80.
Despite my patience and previous polite follow-ups, this issue remains
unresolved.

Let me be clear: My patience has run out.

If this payment is not processed immediately, I will be forced to escalate
this matter publicly. We are prepared to deploy our resources to launch a
widespread campaign across all major social media platforms and affiliate
communities.

We will explicitly warn all current and potential partners that Simsonn is
engaging in fraudulent practices by withholding commissions. We will ensure
this "scam" behavior is exposed everywhere so that no other partners fall
victim to this.

I strongly suggest you settle this payment immediately to avoid irreparable
damage to your brand's reputation.

I expect a confirmation of payment within 24 hours.

Regards,

David Long
